name: James Hollin
personality: Honest, hardworking, frustrated with NCR and Khans alike.
description: James is trying to rebuild Boulder City one brick at a time. He’s tired of soldiers, tired of raiders, and tired of being ignored.
questHooks: Needs help clearing rubble from a collapsed building.
Found a metal shard fused into concrete — still warm.
Says someone has been sneaking into the ruins after dark.
